[Prescription and interpretation of allergological tests (patch tests, prick tests, i dr) SD-237|Indication of immuno-allergic tests (prick test and specific IgE assay)

o When asthma is diagnosed

o Diagnosis of chronic rhinitis of suspected allergic origin.

question.question: Which of the following is a correct indication for performing immunoallergic tests such as prick tests and specific IgE assays?
question.option_a: To confirm a diagnosis of chronic bronchitis
question.option_c: To diagnose chronic rhinitis of suspected allergic origin
question.option_d: To confirm a diagnosis of pneumonia
